# height

**Instance Property**

The height of the video element in CSS pixels.

## Declaration

```swift
attribute unsigned long height;
```

## Getting and Setting Properties

- **width**: The width of the video element in CSS pixels.
- **poster**: The URI address of an image file that is shown when no video data is available.
